name: Wikipedia DeepPurple Molecular Sidebar
description:
2007.Oct.14 Sun, 16:34 --700 (PDT) >> THIS STYLE IS NOW COMPLETE AND SEPARATE FROM GOOGLEVERSE DARKEXPANSE

http://img86.imageshack.us/img86/3377/wikipurple1um5.png 

Originally, this style was meant to be used in conjunction with my GoogleWiki DarkExpanse. But because of increasing trouble in attempting to manage both as a single style, I have now separated them. This should make all future adjustments much easier than they have been before. Hopefully, the result will be a more beautiful rendering of each style in it's own right.

This will also give a nicer icon for WikiPedia!

Updates:
2007.Dec.09 Sun, 11:27 --800 (PST) >> Fixed the Missing Link Page. (So much for evolution!)
2007.Dec.07 Fri, 20:48 --800 (PST) >> Proper background color for Login.

discussions.name: nice, most styles for wikipedia make it look like
